targets.query:
from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.P_AC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value, _field: "PV Power"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHEM-3#xxxxxxxxxxxx#1.Total.InstantPower")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1.0, _field: "Grid Power"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.YieldDay")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value, _field: "PV Energy"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.YieldTotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sourceanalytix.0.0_userdata__0__Calculations__ReturnedPower.cumulativeReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.YieldDay")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0* ${kwhPrice}}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.1.forecast.current.temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.1.forecast.current.clouds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.1.forecast.current.sunrise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.1.forecast.current.sunset")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.P_AC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value, _field: "PV Power"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.1.forecast.current.clouds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Cloudiness")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.YieldTotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value, _field: "PV Energy"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.1.forecast.current.clouds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value, _field: "Cloudiness"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.YieldTotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value, _field: "PV Energy"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.1.forecast.current.clouds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value, _field: "Cloudiness"}))

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.wifi_rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.mqtt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.available")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

9000.text: Microinverter is suspected of being stolen

targets.query:
from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch0.LastAlarmCode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch0.active_PowerLimit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch0.U_AC")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch0.Temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch0.Efficiency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch1.Irradiation" or r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch2.Irradiation" or r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch1.P_DC" or r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch2.P_DC" or r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.${ahoyInvertername}.ch0.Temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHEM-3#xxxxxxxxxxxx#1.Total.InstantPower")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1.0, _field: "Grid"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.P_AC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value, _field: "PV"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "0_userdata.0.SmartMeter.potActual")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000.0, _field: "Smartmeter"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
